overview: Sidney Young is a down-on-his-luck journalist. Thanks to a stint involving a pig and a glitzy awards ceremony, Sidney turns his fortunes around, attracting the attention of Clayton Harding, editor of New York-based glossy magazine 'Sharps', and landing the holy grail of journalism jobs. The Brit jets off to the Big Apple and moves from one blunder to the next.
original_title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
tagline: He's across the pond, and out of his depth.
cast: Simon Pegg|Kirsten Dunst|Danny Huston|Megan Fox|Jeff Bridges
